I think more explanation is needed here of the size dependence, i.e. ,

```
In [6]: (np.zeros((2,), dtype=np.uint8) + np.int16(255)).dtype
Out[6]: dtype('uint8')

In [7]: (np.zeros((2,), dtype=np.uint8) + np.int16(256)).dtype
Out[7]: dtype('uint16')
```

You are right. Thanks! I pushed in a commit clarifying this.

P.S. I have edited your comment, the `Out[6]` output was there repeated twice.
